string-array.name: quotes
string-array.item: Keep relations, which change your situations, not ones which itself gets changed according to situations.
No one is too much busy. It’s all about importance you have in their life.
Trust goes out from the same door, from which the doubt comes in.
In your worst days; often you get the help from the one you never expected.
Negative perception and wrong judgement astray a man in every relationships.
Advise of a loser, experience of a winner and your own decisions will never let you fail in life.
God tests you through blessings as well as challenges.
You can put your phone calls on hold… but not the relations.
